title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1950.13 - Tampering with mains, pipes, hydrants or meter installations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1950.13 - Tampering with mains, pipes, hydrants or meter installations

State Regulations
(a) No person, other than an employee or
authorized contractor of the water board shall open, close or interfere in any
manner with any valve, or gate in any water main or street pipe belonging to
the water board without special written permission of the director. (b) No person, except as authorized by the
water board or the director may operate a fire hydrant or attempt to modify a
water meter, installation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1950.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
